comment._content: Don Marquis 1878 - 1937, en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Don_Marquis, author of "Archie and |Mehitable". Some of his works are available on Project Gutenberg. www.gutenberg.org/browse/authors/m#a245

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content:
..and Archy, not Archie..

"“personally my ambition is to get my time as a cockroach shortened for good
behavior and be promoted to a revenue officer
it is not much of a step up but i am humble”

comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/70251312@N00] Offissa Pupp was one of the characters in George Herriman's comic strip Krazy Kat, not one of Don Marquis's characters. Herriman drew the illustrations for the Archy and Mehitabel books, the first of which was published in 1927.
